name: 2D Platformer Blue
description:
Hi, 

This was a project I had for a long time. I created it to learn the basic mechanics of a platformer game. The game is very short but I learned quite a lot of new things which I can use for future games. I added a few levels just to finish a project. It is a nice feeling of completion and now my mind can rest and keep working on my other projects. If you have played the game then I am really grateful. 

If I have time I may expand this project. However, I want to move on and create other projects.

Many thanks.

Regards,

VR007
